title: Google Pay won't add my card no matter what I do. It's a valid card.
content: When I add my card through my Chase Bank app, it says "Couldn't add card to Google Pay". I've talked to Chase and they say it's a problem with Google Pay. When I add my card manually, it says "Double check card details. Something's not right" but the information is 100% correct and the card is completely valid. Even when I scan the card itself, it still tells me to double check it. The card works with every other app, website or store. It just doesn't work with Google Pay.
